Container.Name: zabbix-agent2.0
Container.Overview: This container is just the Zabbix Agent for UNRAID. Any Zabbix Server configuration/setup will need to be completed by yourself. [br] To set this container up just edit the following: "HOSTNAME" to your unraid server hostname "ZABBIX SERVER/PROXY IP" to the IP address of your Zabbix Server or Proxy [br] If you would like Zabbix to monitor disks as well as system resources you will need to add each one as a path manually. Please view the guide available on the forums.
